nodes.text: The Mavva system was a star system located in the Aparo sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. Inhabited by members of the Kobok species, it was site of the Mavvan Conflict sometime between the years 19 and 15 BBY.
The Mavva system was established in The Essential Atlas, a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released on August 18, 2009, which placed the system in grid square R-3.
